testcase.name: should call only once BluetoothGattDescriptor.setValue() before calling BluetoothGatt.writeDescriptor() on single write when run()
asObservable() should not emit error when BluetoothGatt.writeDescriptor() returns true while run()
asObservable() should emit error when BluetoothGatt.writeDescriptor() returns false while run()
asObservable() should emit error when RxBleGattCallback.getOnDescriptorWrite() emits error
asObservable() should not emit when RxBleGattCallback.getOnDescriptorWrite() emits before run()
asObservable() should emit next when RxBleGattCallback.getOnDescriptorWrite() emits next
asObservable() emit only first descriptor value notified
asObservable() not emit descriptor value if BLE notified only with non matching descriptor
asObservable() emit only value of matching descriptor
should release QueueReleaseInterface after successful write
should release QueueReleaseInterface when write failed to start
should release QueueReleaseInterface when write failed
should set parent BluetoothGattCharacteristic.writeType() to WRITE_TYPE_DEFAULT before calling BluetoothGatt.writeCharacteristic() and reset it to original value afterwards[0]
should set parent BluetoothGattCharacteristic.writeType() to WRITE_TYPE_DEFAULT before calling BluetoothGatt.writeCharacteristic() and reset it to original value afterwards[1]
should timeout if RxBleGattCallback.onDescriptorWrite() won't trigger in 30 seconds
